name: Into The Mist (Quackyrole)
description:
Planet Analysis: We have detected high amounts of gold down in there, unusually high amounts. However there seems to be large amounts of hostile creatures that inhabit the planet, as well as a very thick fog that covers the entire atmosphere. Last crew didn't make it, but we have a feeling we will get farther than before.

A very hostile planet, large amounts of riches and a very foggy environment, how long can you survive?

Originally intended for the Weekly Game Jam 182, but i goofed up on both scope and theme.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move.

Mouse: Aim.

Left Click: Shoot.

Right Click: Use your Flashlight.

Escape: Pause.
